QuestData.Title: Leave Nothing to Chance
QuestData.Description: If there is good in your heart and your conscience is clear, read on.$B$BIn this mine, near the foreman's scaffold, rests a hefty cargo of dynamite. Go there and pick up several bundles of the explosive and make your way towards the entrance of the mine. Once there, set the dynamite and blow up the entrance. Remember to do this for the upper and lower entry points of Wintergarde Mine.$B$BYou must leave nothing to chance. The evil that exists here must never be allowed out. Light guide you.
QuestData.LogDescription: Retrieve a Wintergarde Mine Bomb and use it to blow up the Upper Wintergarde Mine Shaft and the Lower Wintergarde Mine Shaft. Report back to Siege Engineer Quarterflash at Wintergarde Keep in Dragonblight when you have completed this task.
QuestData.CompletionText: <Quarterflash nods.>$B$BHe was a good gnome, one of our best. Slinkin will be missed.
QuestData.RewardText: His death will not have been in vain, friend. The information that Slinkin died for will be instrumental in defeating the Lich King. I promise you that we will make this right.
